description.value:
Potion, common
Frequently used by toshers (sewer-dwellers who seek discarded valuables), the lotion of pure filth covers the user in a sticky coat that resembles mud or grease. This layer prevents contact with any of the filth or debris in a sewer, swamp, or dungeon, rendering the user immune to contact poisons, disease spread by touch, and even sticky spiderwebsâ€”all such things slide off the layer of protective filth for 4 hours or until scrubbed away with clean water.
